data.title: Don't stay if you expect quality and truly non-smoking rooms
data.text:
When reading my review, keep in mind that I spend over 200 nights a year in hotels.  At check in, the front desk people made it a point to tell me that the hotel would be changing to a new type soon and that I should use them in the future.  Not a chance!!!  There's a reason they are changing and that's because it's falling way below standards.  My two highlights were a shower that barely had water coming out of it and a bad smelling room.  As a non-smoker, I can tell when a room use to be smoking.  This was definitely one of those rooms and the front desk admitted to me that it use to be one.  Since I have allergies and smoke is one of them, I could tell right away.  Basically, they just tried cleaning a smoking room and calling it non-smoking.  So, if you're expecting the room to be non-smoking, make sure you specify that (even though I always do).
Yes, they changed my room or I would have checked out and gone somewhere else.  Hopefully they completely tear down this place and rebuild with better quality.

owner_response.author: IHGService, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Express Moreno Valley, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear David M,

We appreciate your feedback as one of our valued guests. Thank you for choosing IHG for your lodging needs. It is regretful to learn that the condition of the room that you were provided was a let down, particularly with the shower facility. We will make sure the appropriate parties are informed about these points that you have raised to ensure that similar instances do not occur again in the future.

Sincerely,

Pam G
Case Manager
IHGService
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Holiday inn moreno valley
data.text:
Not hard to find. Check in was fast and they had my room ready even though I was a little early.
Got a 3rd floor room. A little on the small side especially in the bathroom but I was comfortable.
Bed was comfy and had plenty of pillows.
TV was large enough but lacked better channels and a channel guide. Also randomly every morning at around 8:50 the tv would go out and not come back on until 9am. Odd.
Was glad there was a mini fridge and microwave in room. The keurig coffee maker was a nice touch as well.
Lacked a table to sit at but oh well.
Having central air that was quiet was a huge plus.
Furniture and other areas of the hotel seem a little dated.
There's plenty of parking.
Pool area was clean.
Staff that I had contact with were pleasant and professional.
Enjoyed my stay though.

data.title: Horrible Front Desk
data.text:
The room was decent. I loved the bed and the bathroom/shower was ok too. I found the bed sheets to be kind of sticky (possibly not entirely dry yet) when we first got our room. Other than that everything was cleaned well. 
However when it came to checking out they charged us an extra $40. They wouldn't return our deposit and didn't understand that we should get it back. Absolutely ridiculous.

owner_response.author: IHGService, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Express Moreno Valley, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Mark B, 

Thank you for taking the time to review our property.  We work hard to make your stay comfortable and pleasant so we are pleased to note that you were satisfied with the good rooms and clean bed.  It seems that we were not able to execute an exemplary stay with regard to your dining experience.  Your feedback concerning the food quality and level of service have been seriously taken into account.  Rest assured that these inefficiencies aren't reflective of the high standards we usually pride ourselves in.  Allow me to apologize for any inconvenience these issues may have caused you.  The feedback we receive from you enables us to target problem areas  and take the necessary actions to ensure similar situations can be avoided in the future.  I hope to have an opportunity to serve you again.

I value you as our guest and hope you will continue to choose IHG for your future travel needs.

Sincerely, 

Lera P
Case Manager 
IHGService
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Adequate
data.text: Very basic rooms, ok breakfast. The rate was a little cheaper than being near the Moreno Valley mall, but the quality of the hotel definitely reflects the rate. It's a good place to stay if you're planning to spend minimal time in the hotel. It felt safe, just very basic. There is a bowling alley next door, so that's another excuse to get out of the hotel.

owner_response.author: IHGService, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Express Moreno Valley, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear MLNC,

Thank you so much for staying with us and for taking the time to leave us your feedback. Your comments are highly valuable to us and will assist us in our continuous efforts to maintain and improve the service level we aim for. I am pleased to know that you had a satisfactory stay at our hotel. I appreciate feedback that we receive, whether positive and negative to ensure we provide the best level of service and facilities that we can give to our guests. Thank you again for your review and I hope to have an opportunity of welcoming you back again soon.

Sincerely,

Krysllin G.
Case Manager
IHGService
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent place to stay
data.text: Room was spacious and well appointed.  Hotel is convenient to restaurants.  It offers a free breakfast.  The staff were very pleasant and courteous.   It was a great stay.  I was in town on business. So having a solid wifi connection was excellent.  Most certainly would stay at this location again.

data.title: Nice and Relaxing
data.text: Checked in without any problem.  The receptionist that helped me was super nice!  The entry way and rooms were clean and the bed was comfortable.  We were there for my daughters wedding and had to book additional rooms last minute and the manager on duty and receptionist had no problem with that and quickly got us some extra rooms.  The free breakfast was a plus and even though the room quickly filled with guests the staff was on site to keep it replenished and clean.  I will definitely stay here again if I'm ever in Moreno Valley!

data.title: Great staff, nice place
data.text: I've been staying here since early March. The staff is fantastic and will do everything possible to help with whatever you need. Most of the rooms are very nice. I believe a major renovation is happening soon, so it should get even better. Has everything you need either on site or very nearby.

data.title: Simply Pleasant
data.text:
I was greeted by a pleasant receptionist. We converse about the reason for my trip. To celebrate my sister's 60th birthday. I was happy to find out that the Masonic Lodge (where the celebration was taking place) was next to the bowling alley, which is next to the hotel. So we walked to the party. 

The hotel is on the process of upgrading which is evident by the freshly painted walls. But look out for the old hallway carpet, it is full of wrinkles.

Breakfast included is always a plus. A good variety of items to select from; eggs, turkey and pork sausages, biscuits and gravy, pancakes, a variety of breads and cereals, cinnabuns, fruit, juice, coffees and other hot drinks. I notice there was no mircowave ... I only notice because both days the eggs were cold.  

A jacuzzi and pool were located on the outside of the property.., I prefer in door faculties 

Directly outside the doorway You will find two restaurants, Italian and Mexican. Out the driveway to the right @ a mile you will find a Superior Market, Big Lots and other retail stores.

As I stated my objective was to celebrate with my sister, family and friends. Once that was accomplished my goal was to get the much needed rest from many projects that had taken it's toll. A day and a half of pure sleep in my comfortable cozy bed. 

My goals were accomplished, YES!!!
Ready to take on the world.

data.title: Decent hotel. Good staff
data.text:
I stayed here for 4 nights recently while working on a project for an electric car manufacturer who is relocating to the area. 
I could only get a certain rate through my company's travel agency, but when I mentioned the customer at check-in, the manager at the desk immediately changed my reservation without question to the better rate.
I appreciate that kind of attention.
I did not try the breakfast, although I did check it out a couple of times. It is the standard Holiday Inn Express breakfast, nothing fancy but decent and well prepared and presented.
The room was good. The carpets were clean. My only negative on the room was the bathroom, which is rather small but otherwise functional.
Otherwise a decent place to stay.
I will be returning to the area numerous times over the next few months and will continue to stay there. I usually don't go back to hotels I do not like.

owner_response.author: IHGService, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Express Moreno Valley, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear TheSlaterFamily,

Thank you for leaving a review about your stay with us. We are happy that you rated our service level to be high and we certainly appreciate your nice feedback on our rooms. However, we regret that we failed to meet your standards regarding the size of our bathrooms. We give the utmost importance to our guest comments as they help us improve and continually provide the best guest experience possible. Rest assured your feedback will be reviewed and most certainly be forwarded to the appropriate departments for evaluation.

While we understand that your stay was not 100% satisfactory, we hope you give us a chance in the future to show you how great our hotel is.

Sincerely,

Joel A
Case Manager
IHGService
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice hotel near the freeway
data.text: Nice clean room.  Only real complaint us the screen door onto the balcony was off the track, so I couldn't have fresh air.  On the other hand, I can't remember the last hotel I stayed at that even had a balcony.  Also has early breakfast, which allowed me to leave early.

owner_response.author: IHGService, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Express Moreno Valley, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Joe G,

Thank you for your feedback. We take our guest comments very seriously and always strive to provide comfortable and friendly accommodations. We appreciate your nice comment about cleanliness.

However, we’re sorry about the balcony screen door. We will address this concern.We take all reviews positive and negative very seriously, and your feedback will help us improve for our next guest or your next visit.

Sincerely,

Orlando A.
Case Manager
IHGService
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Relaxing and Safe Stay with Wonderful Staff
data.text:
Hello travelers!

My time in this hotel was well worth the money spent everyday that I stayed here.

Every staff member in this hotel was very friendly and joyful. I can say this because I stayed in this hotel for nearly two months and witnessed the staff treat everyone with professionalism and respect no matter if a traveler was staying one night or a multitude of nights.

As a traveler, you can stay anywhere you please, and I chose wisely by staying in this hotel. I encountered every staff member in this hotel and all of them were helpful and truly joyful people to talk to during my visit.

Expect breakfast everyday from 6:00 a.m. until 9:30 a.m., efficient and effective cleaning ladies, a massive parking lot, an easy commute to popular attractions nearby, and a hotel staff that will be very hospitable towards you during your entire visit in this hotel. God bless!

data.title: Generic
data.text: Just your normal every day holiday inn express. Very nice front desk staff and good location. Free in room wifi, business center, complimentary hot breakfast. Microwave and refrigerator in the room. My bathroom faucet was old and cruddy. Other than that, no complaints.

owner_response.author: IHGCare, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Express Moreno Valley, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear paula p,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback regarding your recent stay. I am pleased to know that we were able to meet your expectations when it comes to providing an excellent and friendly service. On the other hand, allow me to apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced with our bathroom. Rest assured that this will be looked into.

Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back.

Sincerely,

Faith R
Case Manager
IHGCare
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wonderful People, Great Stay !!
data.text: Located 70 miles away from Lax Airport, easy access., we used Super shuttle and we were dropped at the door step, Hosts are great, the owner is more than helpful and sweet. Serves free breakfast, descent and filling. Free WiFi and Neat rooms with TV, Microwave and a small refrigerator. Intoto a great experience of the Country Side.

data.title: Bring your cleaning supplies
data.text:
Some of the housekeepers are lazy....... My bed was made but the bathroom was overlooked. I had a streak on the toilet, freshly shaved hair in the tub, and a Big yellow stain on the comforter. This hotel reminded me of a Motel 6

Bring bleach and etc.

owner_response.author: IHGCare, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Express Moreno Valley, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Lisa H,

Thank you for taking the time to post a review about your recent stay. It is disheartening to hear that you were not able to fully enjoy your recent stay with us due to our housekeeping services falling below your expectations. We would want to follow up on your concerns as we would love the opportunity to regain your faith in us. I have sent you a private message in an effort to obtain more information.

I look forward to your response and hope you will give us the chance to further assist you.

Sincerely,

Faith R
Case Manager
IHGCare
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great stay smoker friendly!
data.text: I was in Moreno Valley looking for a home because of work relocation. I stayed several days at Holiday Inn Express Moreno Valley and was pleased to find it smoker friendly being a smoker. It was an older property but we'll maintained. The stay was a good one the only complaint was noisy upstairs guest. I would recommend and a good value for the dollar.

data.title: When your friends don't answer their door..
data.text: Stayed at this location when the friends we were supposed to stay with didn't answer their door when we got in late. The man at the desk was very nice, and very fast. Had us checked in within 10 minutes. The room was very clean, well kept, and we got a decent nights sleep.  There breakfast was as good as any other, though the hot food left something to be desired stick with yogurt, toast, pastries, juice, and coffee and you will be golden. Highly recommend this location if you are in this area!

data.title: Very nice, clean hotel
data.text: Everything here was great!  My only negative would be no room service but there are plenty of eateries nearby. Location is right off the freeway, The 1st floor room I got was facing the freeway and still very quiet inside the room.  Plenty of free parking.  There's a bowling alley right next door, but I didn't get to check it out.  Front desk staff were very kind and fast.  Hotel has a gym that looked decent.  The king studio was quite spacious.  The bathroom was small but had everything you need, including hair dryer. Towels were soft.  Room was nicely decorated.  Bathroom even had a fan which you don't see in every hotel.  Room had microwave and fridge.  Bed and pillows were comfortable.  This room had a long couch which was nice.  All in all, a great place to stay and I would definitely recommend.  Only reason I gave 4 stars was because of no room service.  There was a breakfast room open until 9:30 I think but I didn't get up in time to try it out.

data.title: Simple, quiet hotel with nice employees
data.text: This hotel is showing its age, but overall it was a good value.  The full breakfast was good.  The room had everything except an in-room safe.  I found it to be a quiet place.  There's a workout room with a few pieces of cardio equipment and a universal station.  The only thing I would complain about is the painfully slow internet connection. The signal strength was strong, but the speed was very slow. VOIP calls are not possible here.  The thing I liked the most about the hotel is that all the employees are so friendly (front desk, breakfast room, maids, etc.).

owner_response.author: IHGCare, Guest Relations Manager at Holiday Inn Express Moreno Valley, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear maynard7,

Thank you for taking the time to review our property.  We certainly do our utmost to make your stay comfortable and pleasant, so we are very pleased to note that you were satisfied with the friendly staff services, breakfast option, quiet rooms and fitness equipment.  We work diligently to ensure our facilities are well maintained and we try our hardest to provide not just good value, but comfortable, clean and friendly accommodations.  We regret to hear that you were let down by the lack of in-room safe and poor internet connection.  Please accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience these issues may have caused you.  The feedback we receive from our valued guests, like you, enables us to target problem areas.  We welcome any opportunity to improve.

We value you as our guest and hope you will continue to choose IHG for your future travel needs.

Sincerely, 

Lera P
Case Manager 
IHGCare
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Nice Place!
data.text: We've stayed here several times before this, did not disappoint.   Love the location across from the highway, restaurants nearby, comfy beds and rooms, breakfast included.   The rewards program seemed little stingy, but as a hotel we would stay here again.

data.title: Friendly staff, nice room
data.text: Very nice staff, was greeted warmly at front desk each time I entered or departed hotel.  Room was nice and clean. Bathroom was small, needed to go between toilet and sink to close door, but very clean.  Breakfast was good, hot food(cheese omelet, sausage(pork, turkey), scrambled eggs), cinnamon rolls, pancakes, danish, cereal, toast.
